description:
Subaru and the president are on a mission to preserve their dangerous book. Subaru`s challenger returns for a rematch. The president takes Moeka on a tour around school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Find the Grimoire! / The Challenger Returns / Moe Stroll
Madousho o Oe! / Chousensha Futatabi / Moe Sanpo
لنجد كتاب السحر! / عودة المتحدي / جولة موي
魔導書を追え! / 挑戦者ふたたび / もえさんぽ
